name: Beijing Ultrapower Software
overview: Beijing Ultrapower Software provides information technology (IT) operation, maintenance and management solutions. The company develops and distributes software products, technology services, and system integration tools. It also provides system network, information security, service flow, and integrated network management. The company caters to telecommunication, financial, and energy sector companies. Beijing Ultrapower Software Co., Ltd was founded in 2001 and is based in Beijing, China.

offices.address2: 5th Floor No.28 Willow Road Haidian District

milestones.description: Ultrapower to buy 8% DHC stake from Microsoft.
milestones.source_description: Ultrapower to buy 8% DHC stake from Microsoft
